backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profile management with access control, and order management (place, update, get, list) with authorization checks, bill number auto-increment, and OrderRecord type definition including weights and delivery tracking.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining type schemas for UserProfile, OrderRecord, RepairOrderRecord, PiercingServiceRecord, and OtherServiceRecord, with a run function that copies state from old to new actor versions.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, views, and utilities for the jewellery order management application with multi-step wizards, authentication, and service tracking.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining design tokens for background, foreground, primary, secondary, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference for the jewellery order/billing React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing authentication state, view routing between dashboard/wizard/orders/repair/piercing/other, edit flows with billNo/repairId tracking, and success payload handling with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice with current year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with branding, authentication controls (login/logout), and Misc dropdown menu for navigating to Piercing and Other service forms.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login prompt card component with Internet Identity integration for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/StepIndicator.ts: Reusable multi-step progress indicator component displaying numbered steps with labels, check marks for completed steps, and visual highlighting for the current step.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Main dashboard component that displays statistics cards and recent records for orders, repairs, piercing services, and other services. Includes a dropdown menu for creating new records and tables showing recent entries with edit actions.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/useOrder: React Query hook that fetches order statistics from the backend actor. Returns aggregated order data for dashboard display.
frontend/src/features/misc/otherTypes.ts: TypeScript type definitions and initial state for 'other' service form data including name, phone, amount, and remarks fields.
frontend/src/features/misc/OtherWizard.t: Two-step wizard form for creating 'other' service records with contact details and amount/remarks steps. Validates input and submits via usePlaceOtherService mutation.
frontend/src/features/misc/piercingTypes: TypeScript type definitions and initial state for piercing service form data including date, name, phone, amount, and remarks fields.
frontend/src/features/misc/PiercingWizar: Two-step wizard form for creating piercing service records with basic details (date, name, phone) and amount/remarks steps. Validates input and submits via usePlacePiercingService mutation.
frontend/src/features/misc/useGetOtherSe: React Query hook that fetches a single 'other' service record by ID from the backend actor with error handling for authorization and not-found cases.
frontend/src/features/misc/useGetPiercin: React Query hook that fetches a single piercing service record by ID from the backend actor with error handling for authorization and not-found cases.
frontend/src/features/misc/useOtherServi: React Query hook that fetches aggregated statistics for 'other' services from the backend actor with authorization error handling.
frontend/src/features/misc/usePiercingSe: React Query hook that fetches aggregated statistics for piercing services from the backend actor with authorization error handling.
frontend/src/features/misc/usePlaceOther: React Query mutation hook that creates a new 'other' service record by converting currency to bigint cents, validating ranges, and calling the backend actor's addOtherService method.
frontend/src/features/misc/usePlacePierc: React Query mutation hook that creates a new piercing service record by converting date to nanoseconds and currency to bigint cents, validating ranges, and calling the backend actor's addPiercingService method.
frontend/src/features/misc/useRecentOthe: React Query hook that fetches a specified count of recent 'other' service records from the backend actor with authorization error handling.
frontend/src/features/misc/useRecentPier: React Query hook that fetches a specified count of recent piercing service records from the backend actor with authorization error handling.
Displays a table of recent orders with status badges, formatting utilities, and actions for creating new orders or editing existing ones.
Defines TypeScript types, constants, and business logic for order materials, types, statuses, and weight field enablement rules based on order type.
frontend/src/features/orders/OrderWizard: Multi-step wizard component for creating and editing orders with form validation, weight calculations based on order type, and integration with place/update order mutations.
frontend/src/features/orders/useGetOrder: React Query hook to fetch a single order by bill number with error handling for authorization and not-found cases.
frontend/src/features/orders/usePlaceOrd: React Query mutation hook for creating new orders with weight sanitization, validation, and query cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/features/orders/useRecentOr: React Query hook to fetch a list of recent orders with configurable count parameter.
frontend/src/features/orders/useUpdateOr: React Query mutation hook for updating existing orders with weight and date conversion, validation, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/repairs/RepairOrde: Displays a table of repair orders with status badges, currency/weight formatting, and actions for creating or editing repair orders.
frontend/src/features/repairs/repairType: Type definitions and constants for repair orders including materials, statuses, delivery statuses, and the RepairFormData interface with initial values.
frontend/src/features/repairs/RepairWiza: Multi-step wizard component for creating and editing repair orders with form validation, step navigation, and integration with repair order mutations and queries.
frontend/src/features/repairs/useGetRepa: React Query hook to fetch a single repair order by ID with error handling for authorization and not-found cases.
frontend/src/features/repairs/usePlaceRe: React Query mutation hook for creating new repair orders with data conversion, validation, and query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/features/repairs/useRecentR: React Query hook to fetch a list of recent repair orders with configurable count parameter.
frontend/src/features/repairs/useRepairO: React Query hook to fetch aggregate statistics for repair orders from the backend.
frontend/src/features/repairs/useUpdateR: React Query mutation hook for updating existing repair orders with data conversion, validation, and query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, handling authentication state and initializing access control with admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains useGetCallerUserRole query hook for fetching the current user's role from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a jewelry-themed color palette for light and dark modes using gold, amber, and copper tones.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides utility functions for formatting and converting data types between frontend display and backend storage, including date/timestamp conversions, weight formatting, currency conversion to cents, and bigint validation with extensive error handling and logging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme with OKLCH color system, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a consistent UI design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking deployment error investigation, migration module state transformation issues, and backend Map data structure initialization problems as pending fix requests.
